   19: 
   20: -module(erl_scan_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([error_1/1, error_2/1, iso88591/1, otp_7810/1, otp_10302/1,
   26: 	 otp_10990/1, otp_10992/1, otp_11807/1, otp_16480/1, otp_17024/1,
   27:          text_fun/1, triple_quoted_string/1]).
   28: 
   29: -import(lists, [nth/2,flatten/1]).
   30: -import(io_lib, [print/1]).
   31: 
   32: %%
   33: %% Define to run outside of test server
   34: %%
   35: %%-define(STANDALONE,1).
   36: 
   37: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   38: -compile(export_all).
   39: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   40: -define(config(A,B),config(A,B)).
   41: -define(t, test_server).
   42: %% config(priv_dir, _) ->
   43: %%     ".";
   44: %% config(data_dir, _) ->
   45: %%     ".".
   46: -else.
   47: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   48: -endif.
   49: 
   50: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: suite() ->
   57:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   58:      {timetrap,{minutes,20}}].
   59: 
   60: all() ->
   61:     [{group, error}, iso88591, otp_7810, otp_10302, otp_10990, otp_10992,
   62:      otp_11807, otp_16480, otp_17024, text_fun, triple_quoted_string].
   63: 
   64: groups() ->
   65:     [{error, [], [error_1, error_2]}].
   66: 
   67: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   68:     Config.
   69: 
   70: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: 
   80: 
   81: %% (OTP-2347)
   82: error_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     {error, _, _} = erl_scan:string("'a"),
   84:     ok.
   85: 
   86: %% Checks that format_error works on the error cases.
   87: error_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     lists:foreach(fun check/1, error_cases()),
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: error_cases() ->
   92:     ["'a",
   93:      "\"a",%"
   94:      "'\\",
   95:      "\"\\",%"
   96:      "$",
   97:      "$\\",
   98:      "2.3e",
   99:      "2.3e-",
  100:      "91#9",
  101:      "\"\"\"x",%"
  102:      "\"\"\"\n\"\"",%"
  103:      "\"\"\"\nx\n \"\"\""
  104:     ].
  105: 
  106: assert_type(N, integer) when is_integer(N) ->
  107:     ok;
  108: assert_type(N, atom) when is_atom(N) ->
  109:     ok.
  110: 
  111: check(String) ->
  112:     Error = erl_scan:string(String),
  113:     check_error(Error, erl_scan).
  114: 
  115: %%% (This should be useful for all format_error functions.)
  116: check_error({error, Info, EndLine}, Module0) ->
  117:     {ErrorLine, Module, Desc} = Info,
  118:     true = (Module == Module0),
  119:     assert_type(EndLine, integer),
  120:     assert_type(ErrorLine, integer),
  121:     true = (ErrorLine =< EndLine),
  122:     String = lists:flatten(Module0:format_error(Desc)),
  123:     true = io_lib:printable_list(String).
  124: 
  125: %% Tests the support for ISO-8859-1 i.e Latin-1.
  126: iso88591(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     ok =
  128: 	case catch begin
  129: 		       %% Some atom and variable names
  130: 		       V1s = [$Á,$á,$é,$ë],
  131: 		       V2s = [$N,$ä,$r],
  132: 		       A1s = [$h,$ä,$r],
  133: 		       A2s = [$ö,$r,$e],
  134: 		       %% Test parsing atom and variable characters.
  135: 		       {ok,Ts1,_} = erl_scan_string(V1s ++ " " ++ V2s ++
  136: 							"\327" ++
  137: 							A1s ++ " " ++ A2s),
  138: 		       V1s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(1, Ts1))),
  139: 		       V2s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(2, Ts1))),
  140: 		       A1s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(4, Ts1))),
  141: 		       A2s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(5, Ts1))),
  142: 		       %% Test printing atoms
  143: 		       A1s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(4, Ts1)))),
  144: 		       A2s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(5, Ts1)))),
  145: 		       %% Test parsing and printing strings.
  146: 		       S1 = V1s ++ "\327" ++ A1s ++ "\250" ++ A2s,
  147: 		       S1s = "\"" ++ S1 ++ "\"",
  148: 		       {ok,Ts2,_} = erl_scan_string(S1s),
  149: 		       S1 = element(3, nth(1, Ts2)),
  150: 		       S1s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(1, Ts2)))),
  151: 		       ok				%It all worked
  152: 		   end of
  153: 	    {'EXIT',R} ->				%Something went wrong!
  154: 		{error,R};
  155: 	    ok -> ok				%Aok
  156: 	end.
  157: 
  158: %% OTP-7810. White spaces, comments, and more...
  159: otp_7810(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  160:     ok = reserved_words(),
  161:     ok = atoms(),
  162:     ok = punctuations(),
  163:     ok = comments(),
  164:     ok = errors(),
  165:     ok = integers(),
  166:     ok = base_integers(),
  167:     ok = floats(),
  168:     ok = dots(),
  169:     ok = chars(),
  170:     ok = variables(),
  171:     ok = eof(),
  172:     ok = illegal(),
  173:     ok = crashes(),
  174: 
  175:     ok = options(),
  176:     ok = token_info(),
  177:     ok = column_errors(),
  178:     ok = white_spaces(),
  179: 
  180:     ok = unicode(),
  181: 
  182:     ok = more_chars(),
  183:     ok = more_options(),
  184:     ok = anno_info(),
  185: 
  186:     ok.
  187: 
  188: reserved_words() ->
  189:     L = ['after', 'begin', 'case', 'try', 'cond', 'catch',
  190:          'andalso', 'orelse', 'end', 'fun', 'if', 'let', 'of',
  191:          'receive', 'when', 'bnot', 'not', 'div',
  192:          'rem', 'band', 'and', 'bor', 'bxor', 'bsl', 'bsr',
  193:          'or', 'xor'],
  194:     [begin
  195:          {RW, true} = {RW, erl_scan:reserved_word(RW)},
  196:          S = atom_to_list(RW),
  197:          Ts = [{RW,{1,1}}],
  198:          test_string(S, Ts)
  199:      end || RW <- L],
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: 
  203: atoms() ->
  204:     test_string("a
  205:                  b", [{atom,{1,1},a},{atom,{2,18},b}]),
  206:     test_string("'a b'", [{atom,{1,1},'a b'}]),
  207: 		test_string("a", [{atom,{1,1},a}]),
  208: 		test_string("a@2", [{atom,{1,1},a@2}]),
  209: 		test_string([39,65,200,39], [{atom,{1,1},'AÈ'}]),
  210: 		test_string("ärlig östen", [{atom,{1,1},ärlig},{atom,{1,7},östen}]),
  211: 		{ok,[{atom,_,'$a'}],{1,6}} =
  212: 		    erl_scan_string("'$\\a'", {1,1}),
  213: 		test("'$\\a'"),
  214: 		ok.
  215: 
  216: punctuations() ->
  217:     L = ["<<", "<-", "<=", "<", ">>", ">=", ">", "->", "--",
  218:          "-", "++", "+", "=:=", "=/=", "=<", "=>", "==", "=", "/=",
  219:          "/", "||", "|", ":=", "::", ":"],
  220:     %% One token at a time:
  221:     [begin
  222:          W = list_to_atom(S),
  223:          Ts = [{W,{1,1}}],
  224:          test_string(S, Ts)
  225:      end || S <- L],
  226:     Three = ["/=:=", "<:=", "==:=", ">=:="], % three tokens...
  227:     No = Three ++ L,
  228:     SL0 = [{S1++S2,{-length(S1),S1,S2}} ||
  229:               S1 <- L,
  230:               S2 <- L,
  231:               not lists:member(S1++S2, No)],
  232:     SL = family_list(SL0),
  233:     %% Two tokens. When there are several answers, the one with
  234:     %% the longest first token is chosen:
  235:     %% [the special case "=<<" is among the tested ones]
  236:     [begin
  237:          W1 = list_to_atom(S1),
  238:          W2 = list_to_atom(S2),
  239:          Ts = [{W1,{1,1}},{W2,{1,-L2+1}}],
  240:          test_string(S, Ts)
  241:      end || {S,[{L2,S1,S2}|_]}  <- SL],
  242: 
  243:     PTs1 = [{'!',{1,1}},{'(',{1,2}},{')',{1,3}},{',',{1,4}},{';',{1,5}},
  244:             {'=',{1,6}},{'[',{1,7}},{']',{1,8}},{'{',{1,9}},{'|',{1,10}},
  245:             {'}',{1,11}}],
  246:     test_string("!(),;=[]{|}", PTs1),
  247: 
  248:     PTs2 = [{'#',{1,1}},{'&',{1,2}},{'*',{1,3}},{'+',{1,4}},{'/',{1,5}},
  249:             {':',{1,6}},{'<',{1,7}},{'>',{1,8}},{'?',{1,9}},{'@',{1,10}},
  250:             {'\\',{1,11}},{'^',{1,12}},{'`',{1,13}}],
  251:     test_string("#&*+/:<>?@\\^`", PTs2),
  252: 
  253:     test_string(".. ", [{'..',{1,1}}]),
  254:     test_string("1 .. 2",
  255:                 [{integer,{1,1},1},{'..',{1,3}},{integer,{1,6},2}]),
  256:     test_string("...", [{'...',{1,1}}]),
  257:     ok.
  258: 
  259: comments() ->
  260:     test("a %%\n b"),
  261:     {ok,[],1} = erl_scan_string("%"),
  262:     test("a %%\n b"),
  263:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{atom,{2,2},b}],{2,3}} =
  264:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b", {1,1}),
  265:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{comment,{1,3},"%%"},{atom,{2,2},b}],{2,3}} =
  266:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1}, [return_comments]),
  267:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},
  268:          {white_space,{1,2}," "},
  269:          {white_space,{1,5},"\n "},
  270:          {atom,{2,2},b}],
  271:      {2,3}} =
  272:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1},[return_white_spaces]),
  273:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},
  274:          {white_space,{1,2}," "},
  275:          {comment,{1,3},"%%"},
  276:          {white_space,{1,5},"\n "},
  277:          {atom,{2,2},b}],
  278:      {2,3}} = erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1},[return]),
  279:     ok.
  280: 
  281: errors() ->
  282:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,atom,"qa"}},1} = erl_scan:string("'qa"), %'
  283:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,atom,"qa"}},{1,4}} = %'
  284:         erl_scan:string("'qa", {1,1}, []), %'
  285:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,string,"str"}},1} = %"
  286:         erl_scan:string("\"str"), %"
  287:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,string,"str"}},{1,5}} = %"
  288:         erl_scan:string("\"str", {1,1}, []), %"
  289:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},1} = erl_scan:string("$"),
  290:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,2}} =
  291:         erl_scan:string("$", {1,1}, []),
  292:     test_string([34,65,200,34], [{string,{1,1},"AÈ"}]),
  293:     test_string("\\", [{'\\',{1,1}}]),
  294:     {'EXIT',_} =
  295:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:string('$\\a', {1,1})}), % type error
  296:     {'EXIT',_} =
  297:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:tokens([], '$\\a', {1,1})}), % type error
  298: 
  299:     "{a,tuple}" = erl_scan:format_error({a,tuple}),
  300:     ok.
  301: 
  302: integers() ->
  303:     [begin
  304:          I = list_to_integer(S),
  305:          Ts = [{integer,{1,1},I}],
  306:          test_string(S, Ts)
  307:      end || S <- [[N] || N <- lists:seq($0, $9)] ++ ["2323","000"] ],
  308:     UnderscoreSamples =
  309:         [{"123_456", 123456},
  310:          {"123_456_789", 123456789},
  311:          {"1_2", 12}],
  312:     lists:foreach(
  313:          fun({S, I}) ->
  314:                  test_string(S, [{integer, {1, 1}, I}])
  315:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  316:     NotIntegers =
  317:         ["_123",
  318:          "__123"],
  319:     lists:foreach(
  320:       fun(S) ->
  321:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  322:                   {ok, [{integer, _, _}|_], _} ->
  323:                       error({unexpected_integer, S});
  324:                   {ok, _, _} ->
  325:                       ok
  326:               end
  327:       end, NotIntegers),
  328:     IntegerErrors =
  329:         ["123_",
  330:          "123__",
  331:          "123_456_",
  332:          "123__456",
  333:          "123_.456",
  334:          "123abc",
  335:          "12@"],
  336:     lists:foreach(
  337:       fun(S) ->
  338:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  339:                   {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,integer}},_} ->
  340:                       ok;
  341:                   {error,Err} ->
  342:                       error({unexpected_error, S, Err});
  343:                   Succ ->
  344:                       error({unexpected_success, S, Succ})
  345:               end
  346:       end, IntegerErrors),
  347:     ok.
  348: 
  349: base_integers() ->
  350:     [begin
  351:          B = list_to_integer(BS),
  352:          I = erlang:list_to_integer(S, B),
  353:          Ts = [{integer,{1,1},I}],
  354:          test_string(BS++"#"++S, Ts)
  355:      end || {BS,S} <- [{"2","11"}, {"5","23234"}, {"12","05a"},
  356:                        {"16","abcdef"}, {"16","ABCDEF"}] ],
  357: 
  358:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{base,1}},1} = erl_scan:string("1#000"),
  359:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{base,1}},{1,2}} =
  360:         erl_scan:string("1#000", {1,1}, []),
  361: 
  362:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{base,1}},1} = erl_scan:string("1#000"),
  363:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{base,1000}},{1,6}} =
  364:         erl_scan:string("1_000#000", {1,1}, []),
  365: 
  366:     [begin
  367:          Str = BS ++ "#" ++ S,
  368:          E = 2 + length(BS),
  369:          {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,integer}},{1,E}} =
  370:              erl_scan:string(Str, {1,1}, [])
  371:      end || {BS,S} <- [{"3","3"},{"15","f"},{"12","c"},
  372:                        {"1_5","f"},{"1_2","c"}] ],
  373: 
  374:     UnderscoreSamples =
  375:         [{"16#1234_ABCD_EF56", 16#1234abcdef56},
  376:          {"2#0011_0101_0011", 2#001101010011},
  377:          {"1_6#123ABC", 16#123abc},
  378:          {"1_6#123_ABC", 16#123abc},
  379:          {"16#abcdef", 16#ABCDEF}],
  380:     lists:foreach(
  381:          fun({S, I}) ->
  382:                  test_string(S, [{integer, {1, 1}, I}])
  383:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  384:     IntegerErrors =
  385:         ["16_#123ABC",
  386:          "16#123_",
  387:          "16#_123",
  388:          "16#ABC_",
  389:          "16#_ABC",
  390:          "2#_0101",
  391:          "1__6#ABC",
  392:          "16#AB__CD",
  393:          "16#eg",
  394:          "16#ef@",
  395:          "10_#",
  396:          "10#12a4",
  397:          "10#12A4"],
  398:     lists:foreach(
  399:       fun(S) ->
  400:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  401:                   {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,integer}},_} ->
  402:                       ok;
  403:                   {error,Err} ->
  404:                       error({unexpected_error, S, Err});
  405:                   Succ ->
  406:                       error({unexpected_success, S, Succ})
  407:               end
  408:       end, IntegerErrors),
  409:     test_string("_16#ABC", [{var,{1,1},'_16'},{'#',{1,4}},{var,{1,5},'ABC'}]),
  410:     ok.
  411: 
  412: floats() ->
  413:     [begin
  414:          F = list_to_float(FS),
  415:          Ts = [{float,{1,1},F}],
  416:          test_string(FS, Ts)
  417:      end || FS <- ["1.0","001.17","3.31200","1.0e0","1.0E17",
  418:                    "34.21E-18", "17.0E+14"]],
  419:     test_string("1.e2", [{integer,{1,1},1},{'.',{1,2}},{atom,{1,3},e2}]),
  420: 
  421:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} =
  422:         erl_scan:string("1.0e400"),
  423:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,8}} =
  424:         erl_scan:string("1.0e400", {1,1}, []),
  425:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,9}} =
  426:         erl_scan:string("1.0e4_00", {1,1}, []),
  427:     [begin
  428:          {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} = erl_scan:string(S),
  429:          {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,_}} =
  430:              erl_scan:string(S, {1,1}, [])
  431:      end || S <- ["1.14Ea"]],
  432: 
  433:     UnderscoreSamples =
  434:         [{"123_456.789", 123456.789},
  435:          {"123.456_789", 123.456789},
  436:          {"1.2_345e10", 1.2345e10},
  437:          {"1.234e1_06", 1.234e106},
  438:          {"12_34.56_78e1_6", 1234.5678e16},
  439:          {"12_34.56_78e-1_8", 1234.5678e-18}],
  440:     lists:foreach(
  441:          fun({S, I}) ->
  442:                  test_string(S, [{float, {1, 1}, I}])
  443:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  444:     NotFloats =
  445:         ["12._34e10"],
  446:     lists:foreach(
  447:       fun(S) ->
  448:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  449:                   {ok, [{float, _, _}|_], _} ->
  450:                       error({unexpected_float, S});
  451:                   {ok, _, _} ->
  452:                       ok
  453:               end
  454:       end, NotFloats),
  455:     FloatErrors =
  456:         ["123.456_",
  457:          "1.23_e10",
  458:          "1.23e_10",
  459:          "1.23e10_",
  460:          "123.45_e6",
  461:          "123.45a12",
  462:          "123.45e23a12"
  463:         ],
  464:     lists:foreach(
  465:       fun(S) ->
  466:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  467:                   {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},_} ->
  468:                       ok;
  469:                   {error,Err} ->
  470:                       error({unexpected_error, S, Err});
  471:                   Succ ->
  472:                       error({unexpected_success, S, Succ})
  473:               end
  474:       end, FloatErrors),
  475:     %"123._456",
  476:     test_string("123._", [{integer,{1,1},123},{'.',{1,4}},{var,{1,5},'_'}]),
  477:     ok.
  478: 
  479: dots() ->
  480:     Dot = [{".",    {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,2}}},
  481:            {". ",   {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  482:            {".\n",  {ok,[{dot,1}],2}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{2,1}}},
  483:            {".%",   {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  484:            {".\210",{ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  485:            {".% öh",{ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,6}}},
  486:            {".%\n", {ok,[{dot,1}],2}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{2,1}}},
  487:            {".$",   {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},1},
  488: 	    {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,3}}},
  489:            {".$\\", {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},1},
  490:                     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}}},
  491:            {".a",   {ok,[{'.',1},{atom,1,a}],1},
  492: 	    {ok,[{'.',{1,1}},{atom,{1,2},a}],{1,3}}}
  493:           ],
  494:     [begin
  495:          R = erl_scan_string(S),
  496:          R2 = erl_scan_string(S, {1,1}, [])
  497:      end || {S, R, R2} <- Dot],
  498: 
  499:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T1],{1,2}} = erl_scan:string(".", {1,1}, text),
  500:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T1),
  501:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T2],{1,3}} = erl_scan:string(".%", {1,1}, text),
  502:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T2),
  503:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T3],{1,6}} =
  504:         erl_scan:string(".% öh", {1,1}, text),
  505:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T3),
  506:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,3}} =
  507:         erl_scan:string(".$", {1,1}),
  508:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}} =
  509:         erl_scan:string(".$\\", {1,1}),
  510: 
  511:     test_string(". ", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  512:     test_string(".  ", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  513:     test_string(".\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  514:     test_string(".\n\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  515:     test_string(".\n\r", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  516:     test_string(".\n\n\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  517:     test_string(".\210", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  518:     test_string(".%\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  519:     test_string(".a", [{'.',{1,1}},{atom,{1,2},a}]),
  520: 
  521:     test_string("%. \n. ", [{dot,{2,1}}]),
  522:     {more,C} = erl_scan:tokens([], "%. ",{1,1}, return),
  523:     {done,{ok,[{comment,{1,1},"%. "},
  524:                {white_space,{1,4},"\n"},
  525:                {dot,{2,1}}],
  526:            {2,3}}, ""} =
  527:         erl_scan_tokens(C, "\n. ", {1,1}, return), % any loc, any options
  528: 
  529:     [test_string(S, R) ||
  530:         {S, R} <- [{".$\n",   [{'.',{1,1}},{char,{1,2},$\n}]},
  531:                    {"$\\\n",  [{char,{1,1},$\n}]},
  532:                    {"'\\\n'", [{atom,{1,1},'\n'}]},
  533:                    {"$\n",    [{char,{1,1},$\n}]}] ],
  534:     ok.
  535: 
  536: chars() ->
  537:     [begin
  538:          L = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("$\\~.8b", [C])),
  539:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  540:          test_string(L, Ts)
  541:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255)],
  542: 
  543:     %% Leading zeroes...
  544:     [begin
  545:          L = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("$\\~3.8.0b", [C])),
  546:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  547:          test_string(L, Ts)
  548:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255)],
  549: 
  550:     %% GH-6477. Test legal use of caret notation.
  551:     [begin
  552:          L = "$\\^" ++ [C],
  553:          Ts = case C of
  554:                   $? ->
  555:                       [{char,{1,1},127}];
  556:                   _ ->
  557:                       [{char,{1,1},C band 2#11111}]
  558:               end,
  559:          test_string(L, Ts)
  560:      end || C <- lists:seq($?, $Z) ++ lists:seq($a, $z)],
  561: 
  562:     [begin
  563:          L = "$\\" ++ [C],
  564:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},V}],
  565:          test_string(L, Ts)
  566:      end || {C,V} <- [{$n,$\n}, {$r,$\r}, {$t,$\t}, {$v,$\v},
  567:                       {$b,$\b}, {$f,$\f}, {$e,$\e}, {$s,$\s},
  568:                       {$d,$\d}]],
  569: 
  570:     EC = [$\n,$\r,$\t,$\v,$\b,$\f,$\e,$\s,$\d],
  571:     Ds = lists:seq($0, $9),
  572:     X = [$^,$n,$r,$t,$v,$b,$f,$e,$s,$d],
  573:     New = [${,$x],
  574:     No = EC ++ Ds ++ X ++ New,
  575:     [begin
  576:          L = "$\\" ++ [C],
  577:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  578:          test_string(L, Ts)
  579:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- No],
  580: 
  581:     [begin
  582:          L = "'$\\" ++ [C] ++ "'",
  583:          Ts = [{atom,{1,1},list_to_atom("$"++[C])}],
  584:          test_string(L, Ts)
  585:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- No],
  586: 
  587:     test_string("\"\\013a\\\n\"", [{string,{1,1},"\va\n"}]),
  588: 
  589:     test_string("'\n'", [{atom,{1,1},'\n'}]),
  590:     test_string("\"\n\a\"", [{string,{1,1},"\na"}]),
  591: 
  592:     %% No escape
  593:     [begin
  594:          L = "$" ++ [C],
  595:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  596:          test_string(L, Ts)
  597:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- (No ++ [$\\])],
  598:     test_string("$\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  599: 
  600:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}} =
  601:         erl_scan:string("$\\^",{1,1}),
  602:     test_string("$\\\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  603:     %% Robert's scanner returns line 1:
  604:     test_string("$\\\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  605:     test_string("$\n\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  606:     test("$\n\n"),
  607:     ok.
  608: 
  609: 
  610: variables() ->
  611:     test_string("     \237_Aouåeiyäö", [{var,{1,7},'_Aouåeiyäö'}]),
  612:     test_string("A_b_c@", [{var,{1,1},'A_b_c@'}]),
  613:     test_string("V@2", [{var,{1,1},'V@2'}]),
  614:     test_string("ABDÀ", [{var,{1,1},'ABDÀ'}]),
  615:     test_string("Ärlig Östen", [{var,{1,1},'Ärlig'},{var,{1,7},'Östen'}]),
  616:     ok.
  617: 
  618: eof() ->
  619:     {done,{eof,1},eof} = erl_scan:tokens([], eof, 1),
  620:     {more, C1} = erl_scan:tokens([],"    \n", 1),
  621:     {done,{eof,2},eof} = erl_scan:tokens(C1, eof, 1),
  622:     {more, C2} = erl_scan:tokens([], "abra", 1),
  623:     %% An error before R13A.
  624:     %% {done,Err={error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  625:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,abra}],1},eof} =
  626:         erl_scan_tokens(C2, eof, 1),
  627: 
  628:     %% With column.
  629:     {more, C3} = erl_scan:tokens([],"    \n",{1,1}),
  630:     {done,{eof,{2,1}},eof} = erl_scan:tokens(C3, eof, 1),
  631:     {more, C4} = erl_scan:tokens([], "abra", {1,1}),
  632:     %% An error before R13A.
  633:     %% {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,scan},{1,5}},eof} =
  634:     {done,{ok,[{atom,_,abra}],{1,5}},eof} =
  635:         erl_scan_tokens(C4, eof, 1),
  636: 
  637:     %% Robert's scanner returns "" as LeftoverChars;
  638:     %% the R12B scanner returns eof as LeftoverChars: (eof is correct)
  639:     {more, C5} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a", 1),
  640:     %% An error before R13A.
  641:     %% {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  642:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,a}],1},eof} =
  643:         erl_scan_tokens(C5,eof,1),
  644: 
  645:     %% With column.
  646:     {more, C6} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a", {1,1}),
  647:     %% An error before R13A.
  648:     %% {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  649:     {done,{ok,[{atom,{1,1},a}],{1,2}},eof} =
  650:         erl_scan_tokens(C6,eof,1),
  651: 
  652:     %% A dot followed by eof is special:
  653:     {more, C} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a.", 1),
  654:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,a},{dot,1}],1},eof} = erl_scan_tokens(C,eof,1),
  655:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{dot,1}],1} = erl_scan_string("foo."),
  656: 
  657:     %% With column.
  658:     {more, CCol} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a.", {1,1}),
  659:     {done,{ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{dot,{1,2}}],{1,3}},eof} =
  660:         erl_scan_tokens(CCol,eof,1),
  661:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},foo},{dot,{1,4}}],{1,5}} =
  662:         erl_scan_string("foo.", {1,1}, []),
  663: 
  664:     ok.
  665: 
  666: illegal() ->
  667:     Atom = lists:duplicate(1000, $a),
  668:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1} = erl_scan:string(Atom),
  669:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1},". "} =
  670:         erl_scan:tokens([], Atom++". ", 1),
  671:     QAtom = "'" ++ Atom ++ "'",
  672:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1} = erl_scan:string(QAtom),
  673:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1},". "} =
  674:         erl_scan:tokens([], QAtom++". ", 1),
  675:     Var = lists:duplicate(1000, $A),
  676:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,var}},1} = erl_scan:string(Var),
  677:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,var}},1},". "} =
  678:         erl_scan:tokens([], Var++". ", 1),
  679:     Float = "1" ++ lists:duplicate(400, $0) ++ ".0",
  680:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} = erl_scan:string(Float),
  681:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1},". "} =
  682:         erl_scan:tokens([], Float++". ", 1),
  683:     String = "\"43\\x{aaaaaa}34\"",
  684:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} = erl_scan:string(String),
  685:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1},"34\". "} =
  686:         %% Would be nice if `34\"' were skipped...
  687:         %% Maybe, but then the LeftOverChars would not be the characters
  688:         %% immediately following the end location of the error.
  689:         erl_scan:tokens([], String++". ", 1),
  690: 
  691:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1001}} =
  692:         erl_scan:string(Atom, {1,1}),
  693:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1005}},". "} =
  694:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Atom++". ", {1,1}),
  695:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1003}} =
  696:         erl_scan:string(QAtom, {1,1}),
  697:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1007}},". "} =
  698:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++QAtom++". ", {1,1}),
  699:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,var}},{1,1001}} =
  700:         erl_scan:string(Var, {1,1}),
  701:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,var}},{1,1005}},". "} =
  702:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Var++". ", {1,1}),
  703:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,404}} =
  704:         erl_scan:string(Float, {1,1}),
  705:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,408}},". "} =
  706:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Float++". ", {1,1}),
  707:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,14}} =
  708:         erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}),
  709:     {done,{error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,14}},"34\". "} =
  710:         erl_scan:tokens([], String++". ", {1,1}),
  711: 
  712:     %% GH-6477. Test for illegal characters in caret notation.
  713:     _ = [begin
  714:              S = [$$,$\\,$^,C],
  715:              {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} = erl_scan:string(S)
  716:          end || C <- lists:seq(0, 16#3e) ++ [16#60] ++ lists:seq($z+1, 16#10ffff)],
  717:     ok.
  718: 
  719: crashes() ->
  720:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([-1])}), % type error
  721:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch erl_scan:string("'a" ++ [999999999] ++ "c'")),
  722: 
  723:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$"++[-1])}),
  724:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\"++[-1])}),
  725:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\^"++[-1])}),
  726:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",-1,$"],{1,1})}),
  727:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("\"\\v"++[-1,$"])}), %$"
  728:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",-1,$"])}),
  729:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[-1])}),
  730:     {'EXIT',_} =
  731:          (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[-1],{1,1})}),
  732: 
  733:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([a])}), % type error
  734:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$"++[a])}),
  735:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\"++[a])}),
  736:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\^"++[a])}),
  737:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",a,$"],{1,1})}),
  738:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("\"\\v"++[a,$"])}), %$"
  739:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",a,$"])}),
  740:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[a])}),
  741:     {'EXIT',_} =
  742:          (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[a],{1,1})}),
  743: 
  744:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([3.0])}), % type error
  745:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("A" ++ [999999999])}),
  746: 
  747:     ok.
  748: 
  749: options() ->
  750:     %% line and column are not options, but tested here
  751:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{white_space,1," "},{comment,1,"% bar"}], 1} =
  752:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return),
  753:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{white_space,1," "}],1} =
  754:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return_white_spaces),
  755:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{comment,1,"% bar"}],1} =
  756:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return_comments),
  757:     {ok,[{atom,17,foo}],17} =
  758:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 17),
  759:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
  760:         (catch {foo,
  761:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar", {a,1}, [])}), % type error
  762:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}],{17,18}} =
  763:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", {17,9}, []),
  764:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
  765:         (catch {foo,
  766:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar", {1,0}, [])}), % type error
  767:     {ok,[{foo,1}],1} =
  768:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar",1, [{reserved_word_fun,
  769:                                          fun(W) -> W =:= foo end}]),
  770:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  771:         (catch {foo,
  772:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar",1, % type error
  773:                                 [{reserved_word_fun,
  774:                                   fun(W,_) -> W =:= foo end}])}),
  775:     ok.
  776: 
  777: more_options() ->
  778:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T1],{19,20}} =
  779:         erl_scan:string("foo", {19,17},[]),
  780:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T1),
  781:     {done,{ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T2,{dot,_}],{19,22}},[]} =
  782:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo. ", {19,17}, [bad_opt]), % type error
  783:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T2),
  784:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T3],{19,20}} =
  785:         erl_scan:string("foo", {19,17},[text]),
  786:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T3),
  787:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T3),
  788: 
  789:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T4],1} = erl_scan:string("foo", 1, [text]),
  790:     1 = erl_scan:line(T4),
  791:     1 = erl_scan:location(T4),
  792:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T4),
  793: 
  794:     ok.
  795: 
  796: token_info() ->
  797:     {ok,[T1],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,18}, [text]),
  798:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  799:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:category(foo)}), % type error
  800:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  801:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:symbol(foo)}), % type error
  802:     atom = erl_scan:category(T1),
  803:     foo = erl_scan:symbol(T1),
  804: 
  805:     {ok,[T2],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 1, []),
  806:     1 = erl_scan:line(T2),
  807:     undefined = erl_scan:column(T2),
  808:     undefined = erl_scan:text(T2),
  809:     1 = erl_scan:location(T2),
  810: 
  811:     {ok,[T3],_} = erl_scan:string("=", 1, []),
  812:     '=' = erl_scan:category(T3),
  813:     '=' = erl_scan:symbol(T3),
  814:     ok.
  815: 
  816: anno_info() ->
  817:     {'EXIT',_} =
  818:         (catch {foo,erl_scan:line(foo)}), % type error
  819:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T0],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 19, [text]),
  820:     19 = erl_scan:location(T0),
  821:     19 = erl_scan:end_location(T0),
  822: 
  823:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T3],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,3}, [text]),
  824:     1 = erl_scan:line(T3),
  825:     3 = erl_scan:column(T3),
  826:     {1,3} = erl_scan:location(T3),
  827:     {1,6} = erl_scan:end_location(T3),
  828:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T3),
  829: 
  830:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T4],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 2, [text]),
  831:     2 = erl_scan:line(T4),
  832:     undefined = erl_scan:column(T4),
  833:     2 = erl_scan:location(T4),
  834:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T4),
  835: 
  836:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T5],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,3}, []),
  837:     1 = erl_scan:line(T5),
  838:     3 = erl_scan:column(T5),
  839:     {1,3} = erl_scan:location(T5),
  840:     undefined = erl_scan:text(T5),
  841: 
  842:     ok.
  843: 
  844: column_errors() ->
  845:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,atom,""}},{1,3}} = % $'
  846:         erl_scan:string("'\\",{1,1}),
  847:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,string,""}},{1,3}} = % $"
  848:         erl_scan:string("\"\\",{1,1}),
  849: 
  850:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,atom,""}},{1,2}} =  % $'
  851:         erl_scan:string("'",{1,1}),
  852:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,string,""}},{1,2}} =  % $"
  853:         erl_scan:string("\"",{1,1}),
  854: 
  855:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,2}} =
  856:         erl_scan:string("$",{1,1}),
  857: 
  858:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  859:             {unterminated,atom,"1234567890123456"}},{1,20}} = %'
  860:         erl_scan:string(" '12345678901234567", {1,1}),
  861:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  862:             {unterminated,atom,"123456789012345 "}}, {1,20}} = %'
  863:         erl_scan:string(" '123456789012345\\s", {1,1}),
  864:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  865:             {unterminated,string,"1234567890123456"}},{1,20}} = %"
  866:         erl_scan:string(" \"12345678901234567", {1,1}),
  867:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  868:             {unterminated,string,"123456789012345 "}}, {1,20}} = %"
  869:         erl_scan:string(" \"123456789012345\\s", {1,1}),
  870:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  871:             {unterminated,atom,"1234567890123456"}},{2,1}} = %'
  872:         erl_scan:string(" '12345678901234567\n", {1,1}),
  873:     ok.
  874: 
  875: white_spaces() ->
  876:     {ok,[{white_space,_,"\r"},
  877:                {white_space,_,"   "},
  878:                {atom,_,a},
  879:                {white_space,_,"\n"}],
  880:            _} = erl_scan_string("\r   a\n", {1,1}, return),
  881:     test("\r   a\n"),
  882:     L = "{\"a\nb\", \"a\\nb\",\nabc\r,def}.\n\n",
  883:     {ok,[{'{',_},
  884:                {string,_,"a\nb"},
  885:                {',',_},
  886:                {white_space,_," "},
  887:                {string,_,"a\nb"},
  888:                {',',_},
  889:                {white_space,_,"\n"},
  890:                {atom,_,abc},
  891:                {white_space,_,"\r"},
  892:                {',',_},
  893:                {atom,_,def},
  894:                {'}',_},
  895:                {dot,_},
  896:                {white_space,_,"\n"}],
  897:            _} = erl_scan_string(L, {1,1}, return),
  898:     test(L),
  899:     test("\"\n\"\n"),
  900:     test("\n\r\n"),
  901:     test("\n\r"),
  902:     test("\r\n"),
  903:     test("\n\f"),
  904:     [test(lists:duplicate(N, $\t)) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  905:     [test([$\n|lists:duplicate(N, $\t)]) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  906:     [test(lists:duplicate(N, $\s)) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  907:     [test([$\n|lists:duplicate(N, $\s)]) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  908:     test("\v\f\n\v "),
  909:     test("\n\e\n\b\f\n\da\n"),
  910:     ok.
  911: 
  912: unicode() ->
  913:     {ok,[{char,1,83},{integer,1,45}],1} =
  914:         erl_scan_string("$\\12345"), % not unicode
  915: 
  916:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  917:         erl_scan:string([1089]),
  918:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
  919:         erl_scan:string([1089], {1,1}),
  920:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
  921:         erl_scan:string([16#D800], {1,1}),
  922: 
  923:     test("\"a"++[1089]++"b\""),
  924:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  925:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,$^,1089], 1),
  926: 
  927:     {error,{1,erl_scan,Error},1} =
  928:         erl_scan:string("\"qa\x{aaa}", 1),
  929:     "unterminated string starting with \"qa"++[2730]++"\"" =
  930:         erl_scan:format_error(Error),
  931:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,_},{1,11}} =
  932:         erl_scan:string("\"qa\\x{aaa}",{1,1}),
  933:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,_},{1,11}} =
  934:         erl_scan:string("'qa\\x{aaa}",{1,1}),
  935: 
  936:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} =
  937:         erl_scan_string([$$,1089], 1),
  938:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} =
  939:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,1089], 1),
  940: 
  941:     Qs = "$\\x{aaa}",
  942:     {ok,[{char,1,$\x{aaa}}],1} =
  943:         erl_scan_string(Qs, 1),
  944:     {ok,[Q2],{1,9}} =
  945:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{aaa}", {1,1}, [text]),
  946:     [{category,char},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,16#aaa},{text,Qs}] =
  947:         token_info_long(Q2),
  948: 
  949:     U1 = "\"\\x{aaa}\"",
  950:     {ok,[{string,_,[2730]}=T1],{1,10}} = erl_scan:string(U1, {1,1}, [text]),
  951:     {1,1} = erl_scan:location(T1),
  952:     "\"\\x{aaa}\"" = erl_scan:text(T1),
  953:     {ok,[{string,1,[2730]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U1, 1),
  954: 
  955:     U2 = "\"\\x41\\x{fff}\\x42\"",
  956:     {ok,[{string,1,[$\x41,$\x{fff},$\x42]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U2, 1),
  957: 
  958:     U3 = "\"a\n\\x{fff}\n\"",
  959:     {ok,[{string,1,[$a,$\n,$\x{fff},$\n]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U3, 1),
  960: 
  961:     U4 = "\"\n\\x{aaa}\n\"",
  962:     {ok,[{string,1,[$\n,$\x{aaa},$\n]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U4, 1),
  963: 
  964:     %% Keep these tests:
  965:     test(Qs),
  966:     test(U1),
  967:     test(U2),
  968:     test(U3),
  969:     test(U4),
  970: 
  971:     Str1 = "\"ab" ++ [1089] ++ "cd\"",
  972:     {ok,[{string,1,[$a,$b,1089,$c,$d]}],1} = erl_scan_string(Str1, 1),
  973:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},[$a,$b,1089,$c,$d]}],{1,8}} =
  974:         erl_scan_string(Str1, {1,1}),
  975:     test(Str1),
  976:     Comment = "%% "++[1089],
  977:     {ok,[{comment,1,[$%,$%,$\s,1089]}],1} =
  978:         erl_scan_string(Comment, 1, [return]),
  979:     {ok,[{comment,{1,1},[$%,$%,$\s,1089]}],{1,5}} =
  980:         erl_scan_string(Comment, {1,1}, [return]),
  981:     ok.
  982: 
  983: more_chars() ->
  984:     %% Due to unicode, the syntax has been incompatibly augmented:
  985:     %% $\x{...}, $\xHH
  986: 
  987:     %% All kinds of tests...
  988:     {ok,[{char,_,123}],{1,4}} =
  989:         erl_scan_string("$\\{",{1,1}),
  990:     {more, C1} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\{", {1,1}),
  991:     {done,{ok,[{char,_,123}],{1,4}},eof} =
  992:         erl_scan_tokens(C1, eof, 1),
  993:     {ok,[{char,1,123},{atom,1,a},{'}',1}],1} =
  994:         erl_scan_string("$\\{a}"),
  995: 
  996:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}} =
  997:         erl_scan:string("$\\x", {1,1}),
  998:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,5}} =
  999:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{",{1,1}),
 1000:     {more, C3} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\x", {1,1}),
 1001:     {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}},eof} =
 1002:         erl_scan:tokens(C3, eof, 1),
 1003:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,5}} =
 1004:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{",{1,1}),
 1005:     {more, C2} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\x{", {1,1}),
 1006:     {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,5}},eof} =
 1007:         erl_scan:tokens(C2, eof, 1),
 1008:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1009:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{g}"),
 1010:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
 1011:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{g}", {1,1}),
 1012:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,6}} =
 1013:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{}",{1,1}),
 1014: 
 1015:     test("\"\\{0}\""),
 1016:     test("\"\\x{0}\""),
 1017:     test("\'\\{0}\'"),
 1018:     test("\'\\x{0}\'"),
 1019: 
 1020:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{2,6}} =
 1021:         erl_scan:string("\"ab \n $\\x{g}\"",{1,1}),
 1022:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{2,6}} =
 1023:         erl_scan:string("\'ab \n $\\x{g}\'",{1,1}),
 1024: 
 1025:     test("$\\{34}"),
 1026:     test("$\\x{34}"),
 1027:     test("$\\{377}"),
 1028:     test("$\\x{FF}"),
 1029:     test("$\\{400}"),
 1030:     test("$\\x{100}"),
 1031:     test("$\\x{10FFFF}"),
 1032:     test("$\\x{10ffff}"),
 1033:     test("\"$\n \\{1}\""),
 1034:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1035:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{110000}"),
 1036:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,12}} =
 1037:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{110000}", {1,1}),
 1038: 
 1039:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1040:         erl_scan:string("$\\xfg", {1,1}),
 1041: 
 1042:     test("$\\xffg"),
 1043: 
 1044:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1045:         erl_scan:string("$\\xg", {1,1}),
 1046:     ok.
 1047: 
 1048: %% OTP-10302. Unicode characters scanner/parser.
 1049: otp_10302(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1050:     %% From unicode():
 1051:     {ok,[{atom,1,'aсb'}],1} =
 1052:         erl_scan_string("'a"++[1089]++"b'", 1),
 1053:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},'qaપ'}],{1,12}} =
 1054:         erl_scan_string("'qa\\x{aaa}'",{1,1}),
 1055: 
 1056:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} = erl_scan_string([$$,1089], 1),
 1057:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} = erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,1089],1),
 1058: 
 1059:     Qs = "$\\x{aaa}",
 1060:     {ok,[{char,1,2730}],1} = erl_scan_string(Qs, 1),
 1061:     {ok,[Q2],{1,9}} = erl_scan:string(Qs,{1,1},[text]),
 1062:     [{category,char},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,16#aaa},{text,Qs}] =
 1063:         token_info_long(Q2),
 1064: 
 1065:     U1 = "\"\\x{aaa}\"",
 1066:     {ok,[T1],{1,10}} = erl_scan:string(U1, {1,1}, [text]),
 1067:     [{category,string},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,[16#aaa]},{text,U1}] =
 1068:         token_info_long(T1),
 1069: 
 1070:     U2 = "\"\\x41\\x{fff}\\x42\"",
 1071:     {ok,[{string,1,[65,4095,66]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U2, 1),
 1072: 
 1073:     U3 = "\"a\n\\x{fff}\n\"",
 1074:     {ok,[{string,1,[97,10,4095,10]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U3, 1),
 1075: 
 1076:     U4 = "\"\n\\x{aaa}\n\"",
 1077:     {ok,[{string,1,[10,2730,10]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U4, 1,[]),
 1078: 
 1079:     Str1 = "\"ab" ++ [1089] ++ "cd\"",
 1080:     {ok,[{string,1,[97,98,1089,99,100]}],1} =
 1081:         erl_scan_string(Str1,1),
 1082:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},[97,98,1089,99,100]}],{1,8}} =
 1083:         erl_scan_string(Str1, {1,1}),
 1084: 
 1085:     OK1 = 16#D800-1,
 1086:     OK2 = 16#DFFF+1,
 1087:     OK3 = 16#FFFE-1,
 1088:     OK4 = 16#FFFF+1,
 1089:     OKL = [OK1,OK2,OK3,OK4],
 1090: 
 1091:     Illegal1 = 16#D800,
 1092:     Illegal2 = 16#DFFF,
 1093:     Illegal3 = 16#FFFE,
 1094:     Illegal4 = 16#FFFF,
 1095:     IllegalL = [Illegal1,Illegal2,Illegal3,Illegal4],
 1096: 
 1097:     [{ok,[{comment,1,[$%,$%,$\s,OK]}],1} =
 1098:          erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK], 1, [return]) ||
 1099:         OK <- OKL],
 1100:     {ok,[{comment,_,[$%,$%,$\s,OK1]}],{1,5}} =
 1101:         erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK1], {1,1}, [return]),
 1102:     [{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1103:          erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal], 1, [return]) ||
 1104:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1105:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
 1106:         erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal1], {1,1}, [return]),
 1107: 
 1108:     [{ok,[],1} = erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK], 1, []) ||
 1109:         OK <- OKL],
 1110:     {ok,[],{1,5}} = erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK1], {1,1}, []),
 1111:     [{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1112:          erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal], 1, []) ||
 1113:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1114:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
 1115:         erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal1], {1,1}, []),
 1116: 
 1117:     [{ok,[{string,{1,1},[OK]}],{1,4}} =
 1118:         erl_scan_string("\""++[OK]++"\"",{1,1}) ||
 1119:         OK <- OKL],
 1120:     [{error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,3}} =
 1121:          erl_scan:string("\""++[OK]++"\"",{1,1}) ||
 1122:         OK <- IllegalL],
 1123: 
 1124:     [{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
 1125:         erl_scan:string([Illegal],{1,1}) ||
 1126:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1127: 
 1128:     {ok,[{char,{1,1},OK1}],{1,3}} =
 1129:         erl_scan_string([$$,OK1],{1,1}),
 1130:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
 1131:         erl_scan:string([$$,Illegal1],{1,1}),
 1132: 
 1133:     {ok,[{char,{1,1},OK1}],{1,4}} =
 1134:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,OK1],{1,1}),
 1135:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1136:         erl_scan:string([$$,$\\,Illegal1],{1,1}),
 1137: 
 1138:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},[55295]}],{1,5}} =
 1139:         erl_scan_string("\"\\"++[OK1]++"\"",{1,1}),
 1140:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1141:         erl_scan:string("\"\\"++[Illegal1]++"\"",{1,1}),
 1142: 
 1143:     {ok,[{char,{1,1},OK1}],{1,10}} =
 1144:         erl_scan_string("$\\x{D7FF}",{1,1}),
 1145:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,10}} =
 1146:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{D800}",{1,1}),
 1147: 
 1148:     %% Not erl_scan, but erl_parse.
 1149:     {integer,0,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1),
 1150:     Float = 3.14, {float,0,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float),
 1151:     {nil,0} = erl_parse_abstract([]),
 1152:     {bin,0,
 1153:      [{bin_element,0,{integer,0,1},default,default},
 1154:       {bin_element,0,{integer,0,2},default,default}]} =
 1155:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>),
 1156:     {cons,0,{tuple,0,[{atom,0,a}]},{atom,0,b}} =
 1157:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b]),
 1158:     {string,0,"str"} = erl_parse_abstract("str"),
 1159:     {cons,0,
 1160:      {integer,0,$a},
 1161:      {cons,0,{integer,0,55296},{string,0,"c"}}} =
 1162:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[55296]++"c"),
 1163: 
 1164:     Line = 17,
 1165:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Line),
 1166:     Float = 3.14, {float,Line,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float, Line),
 1167:     {nil,Line} = erl_parse_abstract([], Line),
 1168:     {bin,Line,
 1169:      [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},
 1170:       {bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,2},default,default}]} =
 1171:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Line),
 1172:     {cons,Line,{tuple,Line,[{atom,Line,a}]},{atom,Line,b}} =
 1173:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Line),
 1174:     {string,Line,"str"} = erl_parse_abstract("str", Line),
 1175:     {cons,Line,
 1176:      {integer,Line,$a},
 1177:      {cons,Line,{integer,Line,55296},{string,Line,"c"}}} =
 1178:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[55296]++"c", Line),
 1179: 
 1180:     Opts1 = [{line,17}],
 1181:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts1),
 1182:     Float = 3.14, {float,Line,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float, Opts1),
 1183:     {nil,Line} = erl_parse_abstract([], Opts1),
 1184:     {bin,Line,
 1185:      [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},
 1186:       {bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,2},default,default}]} =
 1187:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Opts1),
 1188:     {cons,Line,{tuple,Line,[{atom,Line,a}]},{atom,Line,b}} =
 1189:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Opts1),
 1190:     {string,Line,"str"} = erl_parse_abstract("str", Opts1),
 1191:     {cons,Line,
 1192:      {integer,Line,$a},
 1193:      {cons,Line,{integer,Line,55296},{string,Line,"c"}}} =
 1194:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[55296]++"c", Opts1),
 1195: 
 1196:     [begin
 1197:          {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts2),
 1198:          Float = 3.14, {float,Line,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float, Opts2),
 1199:          {nil,Line} = erl_parse_abstract([], Opts2),
 1200:          {bin,Line,
 1201:           [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},
 1202:            {bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,2},default,default}]} =
 1203:              erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Opts2),
 1204:          {cons,Line,{tuple,Line,[{atom,Line,a}]},{atom,Line,b}} =
 1205:              erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Opts2),
 1206:          {string,Line,"str"} = erl_parse_abstract("str", Opts2),
 1207:          {string,Line,[97,1024,99]} =
 1208:              erl_parse_abstract("a"++[1024]++"c", Opts2)

 1210:                       [{encoding,utf8},{line,Line}]]],

 1213:      {integer,0,97},
 1214:      {cons,0,{integer,0,1024},{string,0,"c"}}} =
 1215:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[1024]++"c", [{encoding,latin1}]),

 1223: %% OTP-10992. List of floats to abstract format.
 1224: otp_10992(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1225:     {cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}} =
 1226:         erl_parse_abstract([42.0], [{encoding,unicode}]),
 1227:     {cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}} =
 1228:         erl_parse_abstract([42.0], [{encoding,utf8}]),
 1229:     {cons,0,{integer,0,65},{cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}}} =
 1230:         erl_parse_abstract([$A,42.0], [{encoding,unicode}]),
 1231:     {cons,0,{integer,0,65},{cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}}} =
 1232:         erl_parse_abstract([$A,42.0], [{encoding,utf8}]),
 1233:     ok.

 1235: %% OTP-11807. Generalize erl_parse:abstract/2.
 1236: otp_11807(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1237:     {cons,0,{integer,0,97},{cons,0,{integer,0,98},{nil,0}}} =
 1238:         erl_parse_abstract("ab", [{encoding,none}]),
 1239:     {cons,0,{integer,0,-1},{nil,0}} =
 1240:         erl_parse_abstract([-1], [{encoding,latin1}]),
 1241:     ASCII = fun(I) -> I >= 0 andalso I < 128 end,
 1242:     {string,0,"xyz"} = erl_parse_abstract("xyz", [{encoding,ASCII}]),
 1243:     {cons,0,{integer,0,228},{nil,0}} =
 1244:         erl_parse_abstract([228], [{encoding,ASCII}]),
 1245:     {cons,0,{integer,0,97},{atom,0,a}} =
 1246:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++a, [{encoding,latin1}]),
 1247:     {'EXIT', {{badarg,bad},_}} = % minor backward incompatibility
 1248:          (catch erl_parse:abstract("string", [{encoding,bad}])),
 1249:    ok.

 1256: otp_17024(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1257:     Line = 17,
 1258:     Opts1 = [{location,Line}],
 1259:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts1),
 1260:     Location = {17, 42},
 1261:     {integer,Location,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Location),

 1265: 
 1266: text_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1267:     KeepClass = fun(Class) ->
 1268:                         fun(C, _) -> C == Class end
 1269:                 end,
 1270: 
 1271:     Join = fun(L, S) -> string:join(L, S) end,
 1272:     String = fun(L) -> Join(L, " ") end,
 1273: 
 1274:     TextAtom = KeepClass(atom),
 1275:     TextInt = KeepClass(integer),
 1276:     %% Keep text for integers written with a base.
 1277:     TextBase = fun(C, S) ->
 1278:                        C == integer andalso string:find(S, "#") /= nomatch
 1279:                end,
 1280:     %% Keep text for long strings, regardless of class
 1281:     TextLong = fun(_, S) -> length(S) > 10 end,
 1282: 
 1283:     Texts = fun(Toks) -> [erl_scan:text(T) || T <- Toks] end,
 1284:     Values =  fun(Toks) -> [erl_scan:symbol(T) || T <- Toks] end,
 1285: 
 1286:     Atom1 = "foo",
 1287:     Atom2 = "'this is a long atom'",
 1288:     Int1 = "42",
 1289:     Int2 = "16#10",
 1290:     Int3 = "8#20",
 1291:     Int4 = "16",
 1292:     Int5 = "12345678901234567890",
 1293:     String1 = "\"A String\"",
 1294:     String2 = "\"guitar string\"",
 1295:     Name1 = "Short",
 1296:     Name2 = "LongAndDescriptiveName",
 1297:     Sep1 = "{",
 1298:     Sep2 = "+",
 1299:     Sep3 = "]",
 1300:     Sep4 = "/",
 1301: 
 1302:     All = [Atom1, Atom2, Int1, Int2, Int3, Int4, Int5,
 1303:            String1, String2, Name1, Name2,
 1304:            Sep1, Sep2, Sep3, Sep4],
 1305: 
 1306:     {ok, Tokens0, 2} =
 1307:         erl_scan:string(String([Atom1, Int1]), 2, [{text_fun, TextAtom}]),
 1308:     [Atom1, undefined] = Texts(Tokens0),
 1309:     [foo, 42] = Values(Tokens0),
 1310: 
 1311:     {ok, Tokens1, 3} =
 1312:         erl_scan:string(Join([Int2, Int3, Int4], "\n"), 1,
 1313:                         [{text_fun, TextInt}]),
 1314:     [Int2, Int3, Int4] = Texts(Tokens1),
 1315:     [16, 16, 16] = Values(Tokens1),
 1316: 
 1317:     TS = [Int2, String1, Atom1, Int3, Int4, String2],
 1318:     {ok, Tokens2, 6} =
 1319:         %% If text is present, we supply text for *all* tokens.
 1320:         erl_scan:string(Join(TS, "\n"), 1, [{text_fun, TextAtom}, text]),
 1321:     TS = Texts(Tokens2),
 1322:     [16, "A String", foo, 16, 16, "guitar string"] = Values(Tokens2),
 1323: 
 1324:     Ints = [Int1, Int2, Int3, Int4],
 1325:     {ok, Tokens3, 1} = erl_scan:string(String(Ints), 1, [{text_fun, TextBase}]),
 1326:     [undefined, Int2, Int3, undefined] = Texts(Tokens3),
 1327:     [42, 16, 16, 16] = Values(Tokens3),
 1328: 
 1329:     Longs = lists:filter(fun(S) -> length(S) > 10 end, All),
 1330:     {ok, Tokens4, 1} =
 1331:         erl_scan:string(String(All), 1, [{text_fun, TextLong}]),
 1332:     Longs = lists:filter(fun(T) -> T /= undefined end, Texts(Tokens4)),
 1333: 
 1334:     {ok, Tokens5, 7} =
 1335:         erl_scan:string(String(All), 7, [{text_fun, KeepClass('{')}]),
 1336:     [Sep1] = lists:filter(fun(T) -> T /= undefined end, Texts(Tokens5)).
 1337: 
 1338: triple_quoted_string(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1339:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],2} =
 1340:         erl_scan:string(
 1341:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1342:           "\"\"\""),
 1343: 
 1344:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1345:         erl_scan:string(
 1346:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1347:           "\n"
 1348:           "\"\"\""),
 1349: 
 1350:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1351:         erl_scan:string(
 1352:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1353:           " \n"
 1354:           " \"\"\""),
 1355: 
 1356:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1357:         erl_scan:string(
 1358:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1359:           "\n"
 1360:           " \"\"\""),
 1361: 
 1362:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1363:         erl_scan:string(
 1364:           "\"\"\"\r\n"
 1365:           "  \r\n"
 1366:           "  \"\"\""),
 1367: 
 1368:     {error,{{2,2},erl_scan,indentation},{3,6}} =
 1369:         erl_scan:string(
 1370:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1371:           " \n" % One space too little indentation
 1372:           "  \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1373: 
 1374:     {ok,[{string,1,"\n"}],4} =
 1375:         erl_scan:string(
 1376:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1377:           "\n"
 1378:           "\n"
 1379:           "\"\"\""),
 1380: 
 1381:     {ok,[{string,1,"\r\n"}],4} =
 1382:         erl_scan:string(
 1383:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1384:           "  \r\n"
 1385:           "  \n"
 1386:           "  \"\"\""),
 1387: 
 1388:     {ok,[{string,1,"\n"}],4} =
 1389:         erl_scan:string(
 1390:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1391:           "  \n"
 1392:           "\r\n"
 1393:           "  \"\"\""),
 1394: 
 1395:     {ok,[{string,1,"\r\n"}],4} =
 1396:         erl_scan:string(
 1397:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1398:           "\r\n"
 1399:           "  \n"
 1400:           "  \"\"\""),
 1401: 
 1402:     {error,{{3,2},erl_scan,indentation},{4,6}} =
 1403:         erl_scan:string(
 1404:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1405:           "  \n"
 1406:           " \r\n"
 1407:           "  \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1408: 
 1409:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,indentation},{4,7}} =
 1410:         erl_scan:string(
 1411:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1412:           "  \n" % One space too little indentation
 1413:           "   \r\n"
 1414:           "   \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1415: 
 1416:     {ok,[{string,1,"CR LF"}],3} =
 1417:         erl_scan:string(
 1418:           "\"\"\" \t\r\n"
 1419:           "CR LF\r\n"
 1420:           "\"\"\""),
 1421: 
 1422:     {ok,[{string,1,"this is a\nvery long\nstring"}],5} =
 1423:         erl_scan:string(
 1424:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1425:           "this is a\n"
 1426:           "very long\n"
 1427:           "string\n"
 1428:           "\"\"\""),
 1429: 
 1430:     {ok,[{string,1,"this is a\r\nvery long\r\nstring"}],5} =
 1431:         erl_scan:string(
 1432:           "\"\"\"\r\n"
 1433:           "  this is a\r\n"
 1434:           "  very long\r\n"
 1435:           "  string\r\n"
 1436:           "  \"\"\""),
 1437: 
 1438:     {ok,
 1439:      [{string,1,
 1440:        "this is a string\r\n"
 1441:        "\n"
 1442:        "\r\n"
 1443:        "with three empty lines\n"
 1444:        "\r\n"}],
 1445:      8} =
 1446:         erl_scan:string(
 1447:           "\"\"\"\r\n"
 1448:           "  this is a string\r\n"
 1449:           "\n"
 1450:           "  \r\n"
 1451:           "  with three empty lines\n"
 1452:           "\r\n"
 1453:           "\n"
 1454:           "  \"\"\""),
 1455: 
 1456:     {ok,[{string,1,"  this is a\n    very long\n  string"}],5} =
 1457:         erl_scan:string(
 1458:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1459:           "\t  this is a\n"
 1460:           "\t    very long\n"
 1461:           "\t  string\n"
 1462:           "\t\"\"\""),
 1463: 
 1464:     {ok,[{string,1,"this is a \\\\\nvery long \\\\\nstring\\\\"}],5} =
 1465:         erl_scan:string(
 1466:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1467:           "this is a \\\\\n"
 1468:           "very long \\\\\n"
 1469:           "string\\\\\n"
 1470:           "\"\"\""),
 1471: 
 1472:     {ok,[{string,1,
 1473:           "this contains \"quotes\"\n"
 1474:           "and \"\"\"triple quotes\"\"\"\n"
 1475:           " \"\" \"\"\" and\n"
 1476:           "ends here"}],6} =
 1477:         erl_scan:string(
 1478:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1479:           "this contains \"quotes\"\n"
 1480:           "and \"\"\"triple quotes\"\"\"\n"
 1481:           " \"\" \"\"\" and\n"
 1482:           "ends here\n"
 1483:           "\"\"\""),
 1484: 
 1485:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},
 1486:           "```erlang\n"
 1487:           "foo() ->\n"
 1488:           "    \"\"\"\n"
 1489:           "    foo\n"
 1490:           "    bar\n"
 1491:           "    \"\"\".\n"
 1492:           "```"}],{9,5}} =
 1493:         erl_scan:string(
 1494:           "\"\"\"\"\n"
 1495:           "```erlang\n"
 1496:           "foo() ->\n"
 1497:           "    \"\"\"\n"
 1498:           "    foo\n"
 1499:           "    bar\n"
 1500:           "    \"\"\".\n"
 1501:           "```\n"
 1502:           "\"\"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1503: 
 1504:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},"5-quoted"}],{3,8}} =
 1505:         erl_scan:string(
 1506:           "\"\"\"\"\"\n"
 1507:           "  5-quoted\n"
 1508:           "  \"\"\"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1509: 
 1510:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,white_space},{2,4}} =
 1511:         erl_scan:string(
 1512:           "\"\"\"foo\n" % Only white-space allowed after opening quote seq
 1513:           "\"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1514: 
 1515:     {error,{{2,2},erl_scan,indentation},{3,6}} =
 1516:         erl_scan:string(
 1517:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1518:           " foo\n" % One space too little indentation
 1519:           "  \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1520: 
 1521:     {error,{{2,8},erl_scan,indentation},{3,12}} =
 1522:         erl_scan:string(
 1523:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1524:           "       \tfoo\n" % The tab shoud be a space
 1525:           "        \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1526: 
 1527:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{unterminated,{string,3},"\n\tx\n\t\"\""}},{3,4}} =
 1528:         erl_scan:string(
 1529:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1530:           "\tx\n"
 1531:           "\t\"\"", % Lacking one double-quote char in closing seq
 1532:           {1,1}, []),
 1533: 
 1534:     {error,{{3,4},erl_scan,string_concat},{3,4}} =
 1535:         erl_scan:string(
 1536:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1537:           "x\n"
 1538:           "\"\"\"\"",
 1539:           %% Bad end delimiter: adjacent string start without white space
 1540:           {1,1}, []),
 1541: 
 1542:     {error,{{3,2},erl_scan,string_concat},{3,2}} =
 1543:         erl_scan:string(
 1544:           "\"\n"
 1545:           "x\n"
 1546:           "\"\"\"",
 1547:           %% False triple-quote: adjacent string start without white space
 1548:           {1,1}, []),
 1549: 
 1550:     {error,{{1,6},erl_scan,string_concat},{1,6}} =
 1551:         %% Adjacent string start without white space
 1552:         erl_scan:string("\"abc\"\"def\"", {1,1}, []),
 1553: 
 1554:     {ok,[{string,1,[16#D000]}],3} =
 1555:         erl_scan:string(
 1556:           [$",$",$",$\n,
 1557:            16#D000,$\n, % Unicode character
 1558:            $",$",$"]),
 1559: 
 1560:     {error,{2,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},2} =
 1561:         erl_scan:string(
 1562:           [$",$",$",$\n,
 1563:            16#FFFF,$\n, % Out of Unicode range
 1564:            $",$",$"]),
 1565: 
 1566:     %% Test the real deal in this source code
 1567:     """"
 1568:     ```erlang
 1569:     foo() ->
 1570:         """
 1571:         \foo
 1572:         \bar
 1573:         """.
 1574:     ```
 1575:     """"
 1576:         =
 1577:         "```erlang
 1578: foo() ->
 1579:     \"\"\"
 1580:     \\foo
 1581:     \\bar
 1582:     \"\"\".
 1583: ```",
 1584:     ok.
 1585: 
 1586: test_string(String, ExpectedWithCol) ->
 1587:     {ok, ExpectedWithCol, _EndWithCol} = erl_scan_string(String, {1, 1}, []),
 1588:     Expected = [ begin
 1589:                      {L,_C} = element(2, T),
 1590:                      setelement(2, T, L)
 1591:                  end
 1592:                     || T <- ExpectedWithCol ],
 1593:     {ok, Expected, _End} = erl_scan_string(String),
 1594:     test(String).
 1595: 
 1596: erl_scan_string(String) ->
 1597:     erl_scan_string(String, 1, []).
 1598: 
 1599: erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation) ->
 1600:     erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation, []).
 1601: 
 1602: erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation, Options) ->
 1603:     case erl_scan:string(String, StartLocation, Options) of
 1604:         {ok, Tokens, EndLocation} ->
 1605:             {ok, unopaque_tokens(Tokens), EndLocation};
 1606:         Else ->
 1607:             Else
 1608:     end.
 1609: 
 1610: erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L) ->
 1611:     erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L, []).
 1612: 
 1613: erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L, O) ->
 1614:     case erl_scan:tokens(C, S, L, O) of
 1615:         {done, {ok, Ts, End}, R} ->
 1616:             {done, {ok, unopaque_tokens(Ts), End}, R};
 1617:         Else ->
 1618:             Else
 1619:     end.
 1620: 
 1621: unopaque_tokens([]) ->
 1622:     [];
 1623: unopaque_tokens([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1624:     Attrs = element(2, Token),
 1625:     Term = erl_anno:to_term(Attrs),
 1626:     T = setelement(2, Token, Term),
 1627:     [T | unopaque_tokens(Tokens)].
 1628: 
 1629: erl_parse_abstract(Term) ->
 1630:     erl_parse_abstract(Term, []).
 1631: 
 1632: erl_parse_abstract(Term, Options) ->
 1633:     Abstr = erl_parse:abstract(Term, Options),
 1634:     unopaque_abstract(Abstr).
 1635: 
 1636: unopaque_abstract(Abstr) ->
 1637:     erl_parse:anno_to_term(Abstr).
 1638: 
 1639: %% test_string(String, Expected, StartLocation, Options) ->
 1640: %%     {ok, Expected, _End} = erl_scan:string(String, StartLocation, Options),
 1641: %%     test(String).
 1642: 
 1643: %% There are no checks of the tags...
 1644: test(String) ->
 1645:     %% io:format("Testing `~ts'~n", [String]),
 1646:     [{Tokens, End},
 1647:      {Wtokens, Wend},
 1648:      {Ctokens, Cend},
 1649:      {CWtokens, CWend},
 1650:      {CWtokens2, _}] =
 1651:         [scan_string_with_column(String, X) ||
 1652:             X <- [[],
 1653:                   [return_white_spaces],
 1654:                   [return_comments],
 1655:                   [return],
 1656:                   [return]]], % for white space compaction test
 1657: 
 1658:     {end1,End,Wend} = {end1,Wend,End},
 1659:     {end2,Wend,Cend} = {end2,Cend,Wend},
 1660:     {end3,Cend,CWend} = {end3,CWend,Cend},
 1661: 
 1662:     %% Test that the tokens that are common to two token lists are identical.
 1663:     {none,Tokens} = {none, filter_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space,comment])},
 1664:     {comments,Ctokens} =
 1665:         {comments,filter_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space])},
 1666:     {white_spaces,Wtokens} =
 1667:         {white_spaces,filter_tokens(CWtokens, [comment])},
 1668: 
 1669:     %% Use token attributes to extract parts from the original string,
 1670:     %% and check that the parts are identical to the token strings.
 1671:     {Line,Column} = test_decorated_tokens(String, CWtokens),
 1672:     {deco,{Line,Column},End} = {deco,End,{Line,Column}},
 1673: 
 1674:     %% Almost the same again: concat texts to get the original:
 1675:     Text = get_text(CWtokens),
 1676:     {text,Text,String} = {text,String,Text},
 1677: 
 1678:     %% Test that white spaces occupy less heap than the worst case.
 1679:     ok = test_white_space_compaction(CWtokens, CWtokens2),
 1680: 
 1681:     %% Test that white newlines are always first in text:
 1682:     WhiteTokens = select_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space]),
 1683:     ok = newlines_first(WhiteTokens),
 1684: 
 1685:     %% Line attribute only:
 1686:     [Simple,Wsimple,Csimple,WCsimple] = Simples =
 1687:         [element(2, erl_scan:string(String, 1, Opts)) ||
 1688:             Opts <- [[],
 1689:                      [return_white_spaces],
 1690:                      [return_comments],
 1691:                      [return]]],
 1692:     {consistent,true} = {consistent,consistent_attributes(Simples)},
 1693:     {simple_wc,WCsimple} = {simple_wc,simplify(CWtokens)},
 1694:     {simple,Simple} = {simple,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [white_space,comment])},
 1695:     {simple_c,Csimple} = {simple_c,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [white_space])},
 1696:     {simple_w,Wsimple} = {simple_w,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [comment])},
 1697: 
 1698:     %% Line attribute only, with text:
 1699:     [SimpleTxt,WsimpleTxt,CsimpleTxt,WCsimpleTxt] = SimplesTxt =
 1700:         [element(2, erl_scan:string(String, 1, [text|Opts])) ||
 1701:             Opts <- [[],
 1702:                      [return_white_spaces],
 1703:                      [return_comments],
 1704:                      [return]]],
 1705:     TextTxt = get_text(WCsimpleTxt),
 1706:     {text_txt,TextTxt,String} = {text_txt,String,TextTxt},
 1707:     {consistent_txt,true} =
 1708:         {consistent_txt,consistent_attributes(SimplesTxt)},
 1709:     {simple_txt,SimpleTxt} =
 1710:         {simple_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [white_space,comment])},
 1711:     {simple_c_txt,CsimpleTxt} =
 1712:         {simple_c_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [white_space])},
 1713:     {simple_w_txt,WsimpleTxt} =
 1714:         {simple_w_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [comment])},
 1715: 
 1716:     ok.
 1717: 
 1718: test_white_space_compaction(Tokens, Tokens2) when Tokens =:= Tokens2 ->
 1719:     [WS, WS2] = [select_tokens(Ts, [white_space]) || Ts <- [Tokens, Tokens2]],
 1720:     test_wsc(WS, WS2).
 1721: 
 1722: test_wsc([], []) ->
 1723:     ok;
 1724: test_wsc([Token|Tokens], [Token2|Tokens2]) ->
 1725:     [Text, Text2] = [Text ||
 1726:                         Text <- [erl_scan:text(T) || T <- [Token, Token2]]],
 1727:     Sz = erts_debug:size(Text),
 1728:     Sz2 = erts_debug:size({Text, Text2}),
 1729:     IsCompacted = Sz2 < 2*Sz+erts_debug:size({a,a}),
 1730:     ToBeCompacted = is_compacted(Text),
 1731:     if
 1732:         IsCompacted =:= ToBeCompacted ->
 1733:             test_wsc(Tokens, Tokens2);
 1734:         true ->
 1735:             {compaction_error, Token}
 1736:     end.
 1737: 
 1738: is_compacted("\r") ->
 1739:     true;
 1740: is_compacted("\n\r") ->
 1741:     true;
 1742: is_compacted("\n\f") ->
 1743:     true;
 1744: is_compacted([$\n|String]) ->
 1745:       all_spaces(String)
 1746:     orelse
 1747:       all_tabs(String);
 1748: is_compacted(String) ->
 1749:       all_spaces(String)
 1750:     orelse
 1751:       all_tabs(String).
 1752: 
 1753: all_spaces(L) ->
 1754:     all_same(L, $\s).
 1755: 
 1756: all_tabs(L) ->
 1757:     all_same(L, $\t).
 1758: 
 1759: all_same(L, Char) ->
 1760:     lists:all(fun(C) -> C =:= Char end, L).
 1761: 
 1762: newlines_first([]) ->
 1763:     ok;
 1764: newlines_first([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1765:     Text = erl_scan:text(Token),
 1766:     Nnls = length([C || C <- Text, C =:= $\n]),
 1767:     OK = case Text of
 1768:              [$\n|_] ->
 1769:                  Nnls =:= 1;
 1770:              _ ->
 1771:                  Nnls =:= 0
 1772:          end,
 1773:     if
 1774:         OK -> newlines_first(Tokens);
 1775:         true -> OK
 1776:     end.
 1777: 
 1778: filter_tokens(Tokens, Tags) ->
 1779:     lists:filter(fun(T) -> not lists:member(element(1, T), Tags) end, Tokens).
 1780: 
 1781: select_tokens(Tokens, Tags) ->
 1782:     lists:filter(fun(T) -> lists:member(element(1, T), Tags) end, Tokens).
 1783: 
 1784: simplify([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1785:     Line = erl_scan:line(Token),
 1786:     [setelement(2, Token, erl_anno:new(Line)) | simplify(Tokens)];
 1787: simplify([]) ->
 1788:     [].
 1789: 
 1790: get_text(Tokens) ->
 1791:     lists:flatten(
 1792:       [T ||
 1793:           Token <- Tokens,
 1794:           (T = erl_scan:text(Token)) =/= []]).
 1795: 
 1796: test_decorated_tokens(String, Tokens) ->
 1797:     ToksAttrs = token_attrs(Tokens),
 1798:     test_strings(ToksAttrs, String, 1, 1).
 1799: 
 1800: token_attrs(Tokens) ->
 1801:     [{L,C,length(T),T} ||
 1802:         Token <- Tokens,
 1803:         ([C,L,T] = token_info(Token)) =/= []].
 1804: 
 1805: token_info(T) ->
 1806:     Column = erl_scan:column(T),
 1807:     Line = erl_scan:line(T),
 1808:     Text = erl_scan:text(T),
 1809:     [Column, Line, Text].
 1810: 
 1811: token_info_long(T) ->
 1812:     Column = erl_scan:column(T),
 1813:     Line = erl_scan:line(T),
 1814:     Text = erl_scan:text(T),
 1815:     Category = erl_scan:category(T),
 1816:     Symbol = erl_scan:symbol(T),
 1817:     [{category,Category},{column,Column},{line,Line},
 1818:      {symbol,Symbol},{text,Text}].
 1819: 
 1820: test_strings([], _S, Line, Column) ->
 1821:     {Line,Column};
 1822: test_strings([{L,C,Len,T}=Attr|Attrs], String0, Line0, Column0) ->
 1823:     {String1, Column1} = skip_newlines(String0, L, Line0, Column0),
 1824:     String = skip_chars(String1, C-Column1),
 1825:     {Str,Rest} = lists:split(Len, String),
 1826:     if
 1827:         Str =:= T ->
 1828:             {Line,Column} = string_newlines(T, L, C),
 1829:             test_strings(Attrs, Rest, Line, Column);
 1830:         true ->
 1831:             {token_error, Attr, Str}
 1832:     end.
 1833: 
 1834: skip_newlines(String, Line, Line, Column) ->
 1835:     {String, Column};
 1836: skip_newlines([$\n|String], L, Line, _Column) ->
 1837:     skip_newlines(String, L, Line+1, 1);
 1838: skip_newlines([_|String], L, Line, Column) ->
 1839:     skip_newlines(String, L, Line, Column+1).
 1840: 
 1841: skip_chars(String, 0) ->
 1842:     String;
 1843: skip_chars([_|String], N) ->
 1844:     skip_chars(String, N-1).
 1845: 
 1846: string_newlines([$\n|String], Line, _Column) ->
 1847:     string_newlines(String, Line+1, 1);
 1848: string_newlines([], Line, Column) ->
 1849:     {Line, Column};
 1850: string_newlines([_|String], Line, Column) ->
 1851:     string_newlines(String, Line, Column+1).
 1852: 
 1853: scan_string_with_column(String, Options0) ->
 1854:     Options = [text | Options0],
 1855:     StartLoc = {1, 1},
 1856:     {ok, Ts1, End1} = erl_scan:string(String, StartLoc, Options),
 1857:     TString = String ++ ". ",
 1858:     {ok,Ts2,End2} = scan_tokens(TString, Options, [], StartLoc),
 1859:     {ok, Ts3, End3} =
 1860:         scan_tokens_1({more, []}, TString, Options, [], StartLoc),
 1861:     {end_2,End2,End3} = {end_2,End3,End2},
 1862:     {EndLine1,EndColumn1} = End1,
 1863:     End2 = {EndLine1,EndColumn1+2},
 1864:     {ts_1,Ts2,Ts3} = {ts_1,Ts3,Ts2},
 1865:     Ts2 = Ts1 ++ [lists:last(Ts2)],
 1866: 
 1867:     %% Attributes are keylists, but have no text.
 1868:     {ok, Ts7, End7} = erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}, Options),
 1869:     {ok, Ts8, End8} = scan_tokens(TString, Options, [], {1,1}),
 1870:     {end1, End1} = {end1, End7},
 1871:     {end2, End2} = {end2, End8},
 1872:     Ts8 = Ts7 ++ [lists:last(Ts8)],
 1873:     {cons,true} = {cons,consistent_attributes([Ts1,Ts2,Ts3,Ts7,Ts8])},
 1874: 
 1875:     {Ts1, End1}.
 1876: 
 1877: scan_tokens(String, Options, Rs, Location) ->
 1878:     case erl_scan:tokens([], String, Location, Options) of
 1879:         {done, {ok,Ts,End}, ""} ->
 1880:             {ok, lists:append(lists:reverse([Ts|Rs])), End};
 1881:         {done, {ok,Ts,End}, Rest} ->
 1882:             scan_tokens(Rest, Options, [Ts|Rs], End)
 1883:     end.
 1884: 
 1885: scan_tokens_1({done, {ok,Ts,End}, ""}, "", _Options, Rs, _Location) ->
 1886:     {ok,lists:append(lists:reverse([Ts|Rs])),End};
 1887: scan_tokens_1({done, {ok,Ts,End}, Rest}, Cs, Options, Rs, _Location) ->
 1888:     scan_tokens_1({more,[]}, Rest++Cs, Options, [Ts|Rs], End);
 1889: scan_tokens_1({more, Cont}, [C | Cs], Options, Rs, Loc) ->
 1890:     R = erl_scan:tokens(Cont, [C], Loc, Options),
 1891:     scan_tokens_1(R, Cs, Options, Rs, Loc).
 1892: 
 1893: consistent_attributes([]) ->
 1894:     true;
 1895: consistent_attributes([Ts | TsL]) ->
 1896:     L = [T || T <- Ts, is_integer(element(2, T))],
 1897:     case L of
 1898:         [] ->
 1899:             TagsL = [[Tag || {Tag,_} <- defined(token_info_long(T))] ||
 1900:                         T <- Ts],
 1901:             case lists:usort(TagsL) of
 1902:                 [_] ->
 1903:                     consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1904:                 [] when Ts =:= [] ->
 1905:                     consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1906:                 _ ->
 1907:                     Ts
 1908:             end;
 1909:         Ts ->
 1910:             consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1911:         _ ->
 1912:             Ts
 1913:     end.
 1914: 
 1915: defined(L) ->
 1916:     [{T,V} || {T,V} <- L, V =/= undefined].
 1917: 
 1918: family_list(L) ->
 1919:     sofs:to_external(family(L)).
 1920: 
 1921: family(L) ->
 1922:     sofs:relation_to_family(sofs:relation(L)).
